project1.title: lidar
project1.description: Using some previous and applicable work from members of the ARSENL lab at University of Colorado, Boulder, I create a MATLAB simulation to model the expected polarized returns of a LiDAR system scattering off of different surfaces.

project2.title: Air Quality Dashboard
project2.description: An interactive dashboard that tracks air pollution levels in real time.

project3.title: Habitat Scoring Model
project3.description: A scoring tool that rates potential habitats based on environmental data.
